'''Events''' in ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' are limited time activities that give players rewards. Some events include Story and dialogue that are not available after the Event duration has ended. Being able to access the menu within the [[Paimon Menu]] requires [[Adventure Rank]] 2.

Types of Events include:
*In Game - Access from inside the game
*Web - Access from Web Browser
*Login - Login Rewards
*Mail - Mail Rewards
*Social Media - Community Giveaways & Promotional Content
*Fan Art - Art Submission

See [[Events/History]] for a complete list of Events.
